abstract: The PCTV HD Ultimate Stick, which sells for $130, includes a telescoping antenna for broadcast television.
snippet: The PCTV HD Ultimate Stick, which sells for $130, includes a telescoping antenna for broadcast television.
lead_paragraph: Watching high-definition television does not always require a special converter box or hefty monthly fees from the cable company.

headline.main: Grab Those Free HDTV Signals and Feed Them to Your PC
headline.print_headline: Grab Those Free HDTV Signals and Feed Them to Your PC
